valueProps.text: Automates every step of the tax process
Eliminate word and excel to reduce errors
Automated tracking and reminders for compliance
Handle more clients without increasing staff

proof: Seamless integration with Zoho, QuickBooks, and Xero
Client testimonials from JRB Chartered Accountants, Gulf School Finance, Adzum Global

facts.text: Tax Star is a corporate tax software.
Primary call to action is 'Book a Demo'.
Tax Star automates every step of the tax process.
facts.evidence: Tax Star automates every step of the tax process - from filing and compliance to document storage and approval workflows.

facts.text: Tax Star serves accounting practice owners, tax advisors, and ERP resellers.
AI Powered Corporate Tax Calculator completes tax returns timely and accurately.
facts.evidence: AI Powered Corporate Tax Calculator Complete your tax return timely and accurately.

facts.text: Eliminates word and excel to reduce errors in financial statement production.
facts.evidence: Eliminate word and excel and reduce errors.

facts.text: Automated tax calculation saves 40% of time.
facts.evidence: Save 40% of your time by automating corporate tax workflows.

facts.text: Failure to update registration documents within 20 days of expiry results in AED 5,000 penalty.
facts.evidence: Failure to update your registration documents within 20 days of expiry will result in hefty penalties.

facts.text: Automated tracking and reminders keep users compliant and ensure on-time filings.
facts.evidence: Automated tracking and reminders keep you compliant and ensure on-time filings, every time.

facts.text: Handle 30-40% more clients with automated workflows without hiring additional team members.
facts.evidence: Handle 30-40% more clients with automated workflows, all without hiring additional team members.

facts.text: Tax Star integrates with Zoho, QuickBooks, and Xero.
facts.evidence: Seamlessly integrate your existing accounting tools like Zoho, QuickBooks, and Xero with TaxStar

facts.text: Client testimonials highlight improved workflow and accuracy.
facts.evidence: With seamless integration of tax computation and practice management, it's reliable, user-friendly, and has greatly improved our workflow.

facts.text: Client testimonials report 50% increase in number of clients and 75% time saved in calculation.
facts.evidence: Increase in number of clients 50% Time saved in calculation 75%

facts.text: Tax Star is built by accountants for accountants.
